ref:
11941 *viśūratē ʻ is hurt, is distressed ʼ. [Cf. śūryatē ʻ hurts ʼ Dhātup., visūraṇa -- (← Pk.) n. ʻ sorrow, distress ʼ Vikr. -- &rcirclemacr Pk. visūraï, pres. part. visūramāṇa -- ʻ distresses, is distressed ʼ, visūraṇa -- n., ˚ṇā -- f. ʻ distress, pain ʼ; H. bisūrnā ʻ to put on a crying face ʼ.
